title.rendered: Oregon defense firm focused on defending medical and healthcare providers launches new website

content.rendered:
Keating Jones Hughes, P.C. is a well-known defense law firm in Oregon. Their lawyers offer excellent legal advice across a variety of practice areas. They’re especially known for representing hospitals, physicians, and other healthcare professionals throughout Oregon and southwest Washington in litigation matters.

When designing their new website it was important that we emphasize the firm’s principal focus on the healthcare industry.  There are many defense law firms in Oregon, and in the Portland area specifically. Keating Jones is unique in that they are a law firm that focuses on defending the health care industry.  

Accordingly, we used keyword text throughout the website to underscore their dedication to serving physicians, hospitals, and other healthcare providers.  On the home page, for instance, we included a content slider to highlight just a few of their focus areas, such as physician’s and dentist’s medical malpractice defense (see screenshot below).

The website also employs the use of individual practice area pages to underscore the firm’s wide-ranging skills when it comes to healthcare litigation. The firm handles a variety of litigation matters, including appellate cases, malpractice defense for doctors and dentists, personal injury claims, HIPAA and privacy issues, and more. A dropdown menu from the main navigation makes it easy for website visitors to access the information (see screenshot below).

Visit Website Our Portfolio
